entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Îles-de-la-Madeleine
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:53 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Îles de la Madeleine Airport 6:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: ESE 33 km/h gust 43 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and blowing snow beginning overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 before morning. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
